item.description: One man is in a critical condition while three others suffered serious injuries.

item.title: Alex de Minaur issues hopeful statement after latest inevitable loss to Jannik Sinner at ATP Finals
item.description: Another demolition job has cruelled the Aussie’s title hopes, but he was still smiling at the end.

item.title: Dual-sport star Caoimhe Bray, 15, floored by ‘crazy’ hat-trick feat in Sydney Sixers’ WBBL derby win
item.description: The Aussie teen had no idea what she’d just done until the ground announcer filled her in over the speakers.

item.title: Teenagers charged after wild police chase and carjacking in Camden, Sydney
item.description: A driver was allegedly punched and pulled out of his car by three teens who then took off in the stolen vehicle.

item.title: Melbourne father spends $100k turning home into a fortress, now council is trying to tear it down
item.description: The father spent a fortune fortifying his home after becoming a crime victim.

item.title: Aussie coach Andrew McDonald makes fourth-grade cameo alongside son Ollie days before Ashes
item.description: The 42-year-old kept his options open just days out from the first Test.

item.title: Record defeat to Ireland puts Wallabies on brink of worst tour in 67 years
item.description: Ireland’s Australian hero condemned the country where he was born and raised to a nightmare loss.

item.title: Machine gun attack targets two Melbourne homes in terrifying ambush
item.description: The brazen attacks were caught on CCTV.

item.title: Suspect charged with murder after Netflix’s ‘Last Chance U’ star John Beam dies
item.description: ‘Our community is shaken alongside his family.’

item.title: Supercars title contender Will Brown fumes after fatal qualifying mistake in mixed conditions
item.description: The title contender was left to rue his decision after everyone was caught out by the weather.

item.title: Woman rushed to hospital with head injuries after being hit by e-bike in Bondi
item.description: It comes amid calls to restrict e-bikes across the nation.

item.title: Teenagers arrested after man was allegedly found in possession of a machete in Adelaide
item.description: One man allegedly fled from police before being caught.

item.title: Senior constable injured in crash between unmarked police car and stolen vehicle in Pimpama, Queensland
item.description: Two people fled the crash and stole another car from an Uber driver making a delivery

item.title: OnlyFans star Bonnie Blue plans to return to Australian Schoolies after previously having visa denied: ‘Parents, yes you should be concerned’
item.description: The adult content creator “can not wait” to attend an event for high school graduates.

item.title: Ultimate late-bloomer Brendan Doggett ‘ready to go’ in first Ashes Test after Aussies’ double injury blow
item.description: England will ‘sniff an opportunity’ but one of Australia’s quickest bowlers is aiming to prove them wrong.

item.title: Teens charged after 16-year-old kidnapped and robbed in Truganina, Melbourne
item.description: The 16-year-old was forced into a car and made to hand over cash to a group of offenders.

item.title: England ‘actually try to win’, says Mitchell Starc, after admitting Bazball needed to evolve
item.description: The jury is still out on Bazball 2.0 but a key change has already been identified.

item.title: More children's sand products from Kmart and Target recalled over asbestos contamination fears
item.description: Four more sand sets recalled, triggering school closures and nationwide safety alerts for parents.

item.title: Westpac shells out almost $60 million to underpaid employees over 11-year period
item.description: More than 370 former employees are yet to claim their back-payment.

item.description: ‘I’ve never seen a look like that on his face.’

item.title: Total fire ban announced for Greater Hunter and North Western regions of NSW
item.description: Thousands of Australians have been urged to stay vigilant.

item.title: Major trial examines Ozempic as a treatment for alcohol addiction and liver disease
item.description: A groundbreaking clinical trial could also hold the key to treating alcohol-related liver disease.

item.description: One of Australia's brightest stars has opened up about the darkest moment of her life.

item.title: Social media use soars 200 per cent among Australian kids since COVID-19
item.description: The numbers will alarm every parent as more traditional activities are left in the dust.

item.title: Omega-3 supplements could put pregnancy at risk without proper testing
item.description: Australian experts warn that taking omega-3 supplements without being tested for deficiency first could actually increase the risk of preterm birth.

item.title: Coalition ditches net zero target in major policy shift
item.description: The dramatic policy U-turn will reshape the energy debate ahead of the 2028 federal election.
